fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to equip an Army Vest, granting you powerful defense for the night, up to four times.
- If you are attacked and survive twice, you learn of one random player who attacked you. You gain a gun and two bullets which deal powerful attacks.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If an evil Head (or any other evil role considered the “boss” of their faction) player visits you, you immediately get your gun.
- You don’t commit suicide for killing townies.
